The #SECUREAct: 
1. Makes it easier for small businesses to offer retirement plans to their employees
2. Ensures home health care workers can receive retirement benefits
3. Eliminates unfair tax hikes on children in Gold Star families  https://waysandmeans.house.gov/sites/democrats.waysandmeans.house.gov/files/documents/SECURE%20Act%20one%20pager%20Floor%205.19.19.pdf …

I have cosponsored H.R. 943, the Never Again Education Act, to support Holocaust education in all schools across this country so that the next generation can learn the horrific consequences of anti-Semitism, bigotry, and hate.

Today is Holocaust Remembrance Day, Yom Hashoah. We mourn the loss of 11 million people, including six million Jews, and we rededicate ourselves to never forget and to turn remembrance into education and prevention.
